Ask HN: What high yield savings account do you use for your emergency fund?
text:
I have some money in an Ally HYSA but wondering if it's worth switching to Wealthfront, SoFi, Betterment, or some other online savings account with a higher interest rate. At the time of writing, Ally's saving rate is 2.5% while the others are:

Wealthfront: 3.3%

Betterment: 3.2%

SoFi: 3%

These are all FDIC insured, so it seems like it comes down to the quality of the company's apps and customer service when the APY are comparable. I've also seen that some people are using money market accounts instead of savings accounts. Is anyone going that route and have insights about it?

Ask HN: Data brokers using leaked data?
text:
I used a popular reverse phone number lookup service to see what info they had associated with my cell number.

They had records of my previous mailing address and even had an email address that I only used for Drizly.

Drizly had a data leak, so that's the only way to obtain this specific email address. Is there a way to report U.S. based companies that use illegally obtained data?
